I was proud to be in Orangeburg, South Carolina on Friday to participate in the groundbreaking of the Zan Street safety enhancement project.  The site is one of the state’s most dangerous intersections featuring multiple railroad crossings which are adjacent to both Claflin and South Carolina State Universities.  I secured a total of $3.25 million in federal funds which will realign Zan Street, close two railroad crossings, and reconfigure the intersection to enhance vehicle and pedestrian safety.  This is a critical infrastructure project for Orangeburg, and I thank the leaders of the community for having the vision to make it a reality. http://bit.ly/2BvqMIW
